p: In conclusion, all antiviral drugs are only tried to be used for treating COVID-19. Antiviral drugs should be used after weighing advantages and disadvantages with caution in children. For those with mild symptoms, low dosage of IFN-α nebulization can be used. In addition, LPVr is a choice for COVID-19 children. Ribavirin is usually used as a combined drug. The combination of three or more antiviral drugs at the same time is not recommended.
